title: Drawing, Design for Stained Glass Window: Over Main Entrance - Music Hall, Carnegie Hall, New York, NY, late 19th century
title_raw: Design for Stained Glass Window: Over Main Entrance - Music Hall, Carnegie Hall, New York, NY
medium: brush and wash, gouache, graphite on paper mounted on tan illustration board
inscribed:
recto, in graphite: Over Main Entrance / (5 of These)

verso, in pen and black ink: Return to / Miss A. C. Morse / 88 Morton St. / B'klyn / no. 5-? (possibly 59?)
description: Lunette filled with multicolored glass; interior a lute flanked by pink C-curves.

tombstone.epitaph: Drawing, Design for Stained Glass Window: Over Main Entrance - Music Hall, Carnegie Hall, New York, NY, late 19th century. brush and wash, gouache, graphite on paper mounted on tan illustration board. Gift of Alice C. Morse. 2009-6-2.
